named-query.name: READ_ORDERS_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT order FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order order WHERE order.customer.id = :customerId

named-query.name: READ_ORDER_BASKET_FOR_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT basketOrder FROM org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.BasketOrder basketOrder WHERE basketOrder.customer.id = :customerId

named-query.name: UPDATE_BASKET_ORER_TO_SUBMITED
named-query.query: UPDATE org.broadleafcommerce.order.domain.Order blcOrder SET blcOrder.type = 'SUBMITTED' WHERE blcOrder.id = :id
